name: xMoon
description: xMoon is a puzzle game set on The Moon. It's about using mirrors to reflect laser beams into crystals.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: WINDOWS® 7, 8.1, 10 (64-BIT Required) Processor: Intel i5 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB video memory, screen resolution 1920x1080 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 10 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: WINDOWS® 7, 8.1, 10 (64-BIT Required) Processor: Intel i7 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB video memory, screen resolution 1920x1080 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 10 GB available space
